name: Apocalypse Z0Z0
description:
This is a simplistic game where your objective is to save civilians from zombie apocalypse in a procedurally generated city. You begin right when patient zero turns into one of them, having police officers, soldiers and snipers at your disposal. Ofcourse no one expected a zombie apocalypse, so you will have to train them...

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020, that lasted 48h.

Created by Tomasz Jaworski & Straditarion

Our discord: https://discord.gg/ma6UsQu
We probably gonna remaster & upgrate this game there!

Pssst: To recruit troops click those buttons on buildings...
